errors.Desktop: من المستحيل العثور على سطح المكتب
errors.DirectSound: خطأ في تشغيل الصوت من ديريكتكس
errors.DirectSoundUsed: بطاقة الصوت هو بالفعل استخدامها من قبل تطبيق آخر
errors.DirectSoundMemory: خطأ في برنامج تشغيل بطاقة الصوت : لا يكفي الذاكرة
errors.CoreAudio: خطأ في تشغيل الصوت من CoreAudio
errors.FixDB: معطوب قاعدة البيانات على القرص %c : .\ n الذهاب إلى تكوين المستعرض / وانقر فوق إصلاح لإصلاح %c: قاعدة البيانات
errors.Skin: (xml في %i الملف غير صالح الجلد (خط خطأ
errors.WDMError: من المستحيل أن الحرف الأول من تسهيلات الصوت السائق. يرجى التحقق من أن لديك تسهيلات مناسبة (وليس محمل) تثبيت برنامج تشغيل ، مع رباعية ظائف الإخراج \ ن (يرجى ملاحظة أن Win95 وWin98osr1 لا تدعم تسهيلات السائقين)
errors.QueryClose: والموسيقى ما تزال تلعب! \ nAre أنت متأكد من أنك تريد إنهاء VirtualDJ؟
errors.security: أغنية هو اللعب على هذا السطح. \ nAre أنت متأكد من أنك تريد إيقاف ذلك؟
errors.DemoLimit2: هذه ليست سوى نسخة تجريبية من VirtualDJ. \ nPlease زيارة موقعنا على الانترنت لأجل http://www.virtualdj.com/ النسخة الكاملة
errors.SerialError: حماية الخطأ %i. يرجى الاتصال بنا على http://www.virtualdj.com/contact/
errors.BadCDRip: ومؤتمر نزع السلاح غير قابل للقراءة. \ nMaybe عليك أن تحاول تنظيفه.
errors.Controller: وحدة تحكم لم يتم اكتشافها. \ nPlease المكونات في وحدة تحكم وتشغيل VirtualDJ مرة أخرى.
errors.AsioChanError: خطأ في اسيو السائق سليم : لا يوجد ما يكفي من القنوات
errors.TimecodeSignalError: لا توجد إشارة timecode وجدت. \ nPlease تلعب الفينيل timecoded على المناورة وحاول مرة أخرى. \ nIf انها لا تزال لا تعمل ، التحقق من الكابلات ، ومجلدات من كرت الصوت.
errors.Direct3DError: غير صالح إصدار ديريكتكس. \ nPlease تركيب ما لا يقل عن ديريكتكس v9.0c. \ nYou يمكن تحميله مجانا من موقع مايكروسوفت : \ nhttp : / / www.microsoft.com / ديركتإكس
errors.DJCDemoLimit: ودعم timecode هي ميزة متوفرة فقط في 'الفنية' إصدار VirtualDJ. \ nThe 'DJConsole الطبعة' النسخة المتوفرة مع DJConsole فقط سيسمح لك اختبار لمدة 5 دقائق. \ ن \ nIf تريد ترقية إلى إصدار برو ، يرجى زيارة موقعنا على الانترنت : \ nhttp : / / www.virtualdj.com/
errors.VideoLimit: عذرا ، ملء الشاشة الفيديو الدعم متوفر فقط في النسخة المهنية للVirtualDJ. \ ن \ nIf كنت ترغب في الترقية إلى الإصدار برو ، يرجى زيارة موقعنا على الانترنت : \ nhttp : / / www.virtualdj.com/
errors.DRMRecord: واحد من الملف الذي يلعب حاليا مع محمي حماية الحقوق الرقمية. \ nThus ، فإنه يحظر على المحضر أو حرق.
errors.SkinSize: تحذير! \ nThe الجلد تحاول استخدام لديه قرار أعلى من الشاشة
errors.ShortcutExists: هذا الاختصار تم تعيينه مسبقا. \ ن \ nClick نعم لإضافة اختصار جديد وبناء وحدات الماكرو. \ nClick لا لاستبدال الاختصار السابق.
errors.ThreadBlocked: تحذير! \ نظام nThe كان لا تستجيب (ليالي (%s). \ nVirtualDJ أنجزت الشفاء ، والآن يجب أن تعمل موافق مرة أخرى. \ nStill ، قد تحتاج إلى إعادة تشغيل البرنامج في المرة القادمة لأنها ملائمة بما فيه الكفاية بالنسبة لك أن تفعل ذلك.
errors.NetSearchLimit: NetSearch هي سمة المتاحة لVirtualDJ الأعضاء. \ nPlease زيارة http://www.virtualdj.com/ لمزيد من المعلومات.
errors.NetSearchNeedLogin: أنت في حاجة إلى الدخول إلى حسابك في VirtualDJ.com حساب لاستخدام هذه الميزة. \ nPlease الذهاب إلى التكوين / شبكة وتوفير المستخدم وكلمة السر الخاصة بك.
errors.NetSearchCacheError: هذا الملف المؤقت قد انتهت صلاحيتها. الرجاء الاتصال بإنترنت لتبرير ذلك.
errors.NetSearchBadDate: والتاريخ على الكمبيوتر بشكل غير صحيح. يرجى اصلاحها قبل استخدام NetSearch
errors.NoInternet: اتصال إنترنت غير متوفر. الرجاء الاتصال بالإنترنت لاستخدام هذه الميزة.

Others.LameHelp: الرجاء اختيار ترميز المساعد لتسجيل في mp3. \ ن \ nIf كنت بحاجة إلى مساعدة مع هذه الميزة ، يرجى زيارة موقعنا على الانترنت.
Others.VScratchHelp: الظاهري - الصفر. \ nYou سوف تحتاج إلى كاميرا أو آلة تصوير فيديو لاستخدام هذه الميزة. \ المناسبة الحاضرة الكاميرا موصول ، تمر يدك على الخط الاحمر الى نقطة الصفر.
Others.VControlHelp: الفينيل - التحكم. \ nYou سوف تحتاج إلى كاميرا أو آلة تصوير فيديو لاستخدام هذه الميزة. \ nPlace الكاميرا لرؤية مركز بك الفينيل ، فليكن دورك في أسطوانات 45RPM ومعايرة الصحافة. \ المناسبة الحاضرة معايرة ، استخدام مساعيكم الفينيل كالمعتاد ، وسوف يتبع VirtualDJ.
Others.DragToStart: اسحب أغنية على هذا السطح لتحميله
Others.AutoUpdate: VirtualDJ سوف يحاول الآن أن للاتصال بالإنترنت ، ومعرفة ما إذا كان يتوفر إصدار جديد. \ ن \ nYou يمكن تعطيل هذا السلوك في القائمة التكوين في أي وقت.
Others.OverwritePrompt: هذا الملف موجود مسبقا. \ nDo تريد الكتابة؟
Others.NoDelete: لا يمكنك حذف ملف الذي هو في الواقع لعب
Others.NapsterHelp: مرحبا بكم في قاعدة البيانات العالمية VirtualDJ مدعوم من نابستر. \ ن \ nIf لديك اتصال بالإنترنت ، سيكون هذا المجلد تتيح لك تصفح مباشرة من خلال الملايين من المسارات استضافت في نابستر. \ nJust اكتب شيئا في مربع البحث والعثور على المسارات تريد. \ ن \ nYou يمكن تصفح مجانا ، ولكن من أجل أن يكون قادرا على اللعب على المسارات ، ستحتاج الى الاشتراك في نابستر. \ nIf لم تكن قد قمت بالفعل ، يمكنك الاشتراك في http://www.napster . com / \ ن (وهذه الخدمة قد لا تكون متوفرة في بلدك)
Others.DJCHeadphonesHelp: إذا كنت ترغب في الاستماع لأغنية في سماعات الرأس ، اضغط على زر يحمل شعار سماعة الرأس على DJConsole
Others.DBConversionOk: قاعدة البيانات الخاصة بك v4.x تم تحويل بنجاح. \ nAll ? ط مداخل تم استيرادها والمتطابقة.
Others.DBConversionBad: قاعدة البيانات الخاصة بك v4.x تم تحويلها. \ ن ط ? مداخل تم استيرادها. \ ط ن ? وتمت مطابقة ، لكنني لم ? في قاعدة البيانات المحلية. \ مداخل nThese سوف تكون مطابقة لملفاتك الفعلية تتصفح لهم. \ nIf تريد تسريع عملية التصفح ، يمكنك يدويا حدد "إضافة إلى البحث الديسيبل" على المجلدات ذات الصلة.
Others.FactoryMapper: هل أنت متأكد أنك تريد أن يعاود هذا مخطط لضبط المصنع؟
Others.NoFactoryMapper: لا توجد الإعدادات الافتراضية لهذا الجهاز. هل تريد أن تمحو على أي حال؟

Filters.wavmp3: الموج ملف (*. الرعايا) \ 0 *. الرعايا \ 0MP3 ملف (*. mp3) \ 0 *. mp3 \ 0
Filters.bincue: حرق الملفات المضغوطة (*. جديلة / *. بن) \ 0 *. بن ، *. الاشارة \ 0
Filters.Samples: جميع العينات \ 0 *. الرعايا ؛ *. mp3 ؛ *. ماجدة الرومي ؛ *. محامون بلا حدود ؛ *. الحزب الديمقراطي المسيحي ؛ *. أغ ؛ *. vdj \ 0VDJ عينات \ 0 *. vdj \ 0
Filters.mov: ملف الفيديو (*. وسائل التحقق) \ 0 *. وسائل التحقق \ 0

Serial.Title: الرقم التسلسلي
Serial.Label1: مرحبا بكم في VirtualDJ \ ن \ nPlease إدخال الرقم التسلسلي لتزويد المنتج الخاص بك.

error.Title: تحطم الحرس
error.Label1: ولقد حدث خطأ فادح! \ nVirtualDJ يمكن في محاولة لاسترداد تلقائيا من تحطم الطائرة. \ ن \ nJust انقر على "استرداد" كل شيء ويجب أن يكون على ما يرام.

ContextMenu.NetSearchAlways: فقط عندما لا NetSearch النتائج المحلية
ContextMenu.CancelCache: إلغاء التحميل إلى ذاكرة التخزين المؤقت

Options.LinkOnDrop: وصله الفيديو عندما أسقطت على نافذة المعاينة
Options.EmptyFx: استخدم هذا البرنامج المساعد لملفات الصوت فقط :
Options.LEHelp: مرحبا بكم في VirtualDJ جنيه. \ ن \ nVirtualDJ جنيه هو الكمال برامج مصاحبة لجهاز تحكم جديد. \ الصئبان ميزات قد تم تصميمها خصيصا لتلائم جهاز تحكم وتعطيك خلط تجربة ممتعة أكثر. \ ن \ nIf تحتاج أكثر تقدما الميزات ، VirtualDJ جنيه كما تسمح لك لاختبار ميزات الحرة للمحترفين VirtualDJ البرمجيات. \ nYou يمكن تفعيل VirtualDJ ميزات للمحترفين لمدة 20 يوما. بعد هذه الأيام 20 ، والميزات المتاحة ستكون تلك VirtualDJ جنيه مرة أخرى.
Options.LENotActivated: 20 يوما من المحاكمة لم تستخدم حتى الآن
Options.TC45RPM: ضبط للحصول على 45 لفة في الدقيقة

Tooltips.SoundInput: حدد إذا كنت سوف تستخدم مدخلات timecode وكم
Tooltips.SoundOutput: حدد كم والقنوات VirtualDJ ما ينبغي إخراج
Tooltips.SoundCards: حدد التي كرت الصوت (ق) ينبغي استخدام VirtualDJ (القائمة سوف تظهر كرت الصوت المتاحة لإدخال / إخراج التكوين الذي حددته)
Tooltips.SoundTimecode: اضغط هنا لمعايرة جهاز الفرش المصنوع من الفينيل timecode
Tooltips.SoundInputChannels: حدد التي تأتي من المدخلات التي سطر
Tooltips.SoundOutputChannels: الذي حدد الانتاج الذي يذهب إلى خط
Tooltips.SoundDJC: إذا كان محددا ، وسوف تستخدم كرت الصوت DJConsole تكون في وضع اسيو ، وعندما يتم استخدام الالتفافية ، وسوف يكون مدخلا لمعالجتها من قبل VirtualDJ لتطبيق تكافؤ
Tooltips.SoundSSLPhono: اختر هذا الخيار لاستخدام بطاقة SL1 مع أسطوانات
Tooltips.SoundSSLLine: اختر هذا الخيار لاستخدام بطاقة SL1 مع مشغل الأقراص المدمجة
Tooltips.SoundASIOUltra: اسيو الترا الإختفاء واسطة ، والكمون وسوف يكون أقل ، ولكن ليس كل اسيو السائق يمكن التعامل مع هذا الأمر
Tooltips.SoundApply: اضغط هنا لتطبيق التعديلات التي أجريتها
Tooltips.SkinSkin: حدد واجهة رسومية جديدة (يمكنك تحميل جلود إضافية من http://www.virtualdj.com/)
Tooltips.SkinLanguage: تغيير اللغة الافتراضية (يمكنك تحميل لغات إضافية من http://www.virtualdj.com/)
Tooltips.MapperWysiwyg: احصل على عمل من عنصر من الجلد
Tooltips.MapperAutolearn: AutoLearn تمكنك من الحصول على اسم المفتاح فقط عن طريق الضغط عليه على جهاز تحكم
Tooltips.MapperAction: أدخل دعوى للحصول على هذا المفتاح ، في VDJscript اللغة
Tooltips.BrowserVolumes: المجلد مجلدات يسرد كافة محركات متصل
Tooltips.BrowserDesktop: مجلد سطح المكتب يحتوي على محتوى موقعك deckstop
Tooltips.BrowserNetSearch: المجلد NetSearch يحمل الملفات المخزنة مؤقتا من NetSearch ، وتسمح لك باستخدام NetSearch عند إزالته من خياراتك البحث العادية
Tooltips.BrowserGenres: النوع من المجلد فرز جميع الأغاني حسب النوع ، وفقا لبطاقة ID3
Tooltips.BrowserHistory: مجلد والتاريخ كل ما تبذلونه من tracklisting الماضية ، حسب التاريخ
Tooltips.BrowseriTunes: المجلد تيونز لديه كل العازفين ايتون الخاصة بك
Tooltips.BrowserCrates: المجلد صناديق فقد كل ما تبذلونه من صناديق خدمة تصميم المواقع
Tooltips.BrowserPlaylists: المجلد التشغيل وحفظ كل ما تبذلونه من العازفين
Tooltips.BrowserFavorites: المجلدات المفضلة هي المجلد الذي حددته ب "رصد" المجلدات
Tooltips.BrowserVFolders: المجلدات الافتراضية هي "غير الخاضعة للرقابة" المجلدات التي تم إنشاؤها
Tooltips.BrowserFFolders: تصفية المجلدات هي "تلقائي" المجلدات التي تم إنشاؤها
Tooltips.BrowserCheck: الأغاني التي تحقق من قاعدة البيانات الخاصة بك ليست موجودة على الكمبيوتر الخاص بك بعد الآن ، وإزالتها من نتائج البحث
Tooltips.BrowserClean: تنظيف قاعدة البيانات الخاصة بك من كل الأغاني التي ليست موجودة على الكمبيوتر الخاص بك بعد الآن
Tooltips.BrowserFix: فيكس قاعدة البيانات الخاصة بك إذا كان قد تم معطوبة ، وإعادة ضغط فإنه
Tooltips.BrowserTag: اسمحوا VirtualDJ تلقائيا تحميل واستخدام علامات ID3 من الأغاني أنه واجه
Tooltips.BrowserTagTitle: الحصول على الفنان / عنوان معلومات من علامات ID3 أو من اسم
Tooltips.BrowserTagComment: الحصول على تعليقات من علامات ID3
Tooltips.BrowserCover: تلقائيا البحث في الإنترنت عن أعمال فنية تغطي إذا لم تكن متوفرة محليا
Tooltips.BrowserSearch: تلقائيا إضافة كل أغنية واجه لقاعدة البيانات للبحث عند استعراض المجلدات
Tooltips.NetworkNetSearch: NetSearch هو الميزة التي تسمح بالبحث تلقائيا VirtualDJ مصادر مختلفة على شبكة الإنترنت والموسيقى والفيديو ، وتمكنك من تيار لهم مباشرة على الطوابق. \ nYou حاجة إلى أن يكون VirtualDJ الأعضاء من أجل استخدام NetSearch.
Tooltips.NetworkMusicGroups: هو الميزة التي تسمح لك نشاطركم التشغيل مع المستخدمين الآخرين على VirtualDJ.com ، و / أو الاستفادة من العازفين للحصول على النصائح يعيشون على اختيار الموسيقى الخاصة بك. \ nYou حاجة إلى أن يكون VirtualDJ الأعضاء من أجل استخدام MusicGroups
Tooltips.NetworkAnonymousSession: لا ترسل لائحة التشغيل خلال هذه الدورة. وسوف يكون هذا الإعداد reseted المرة التالية التي تبدأ VirtualDJ.
Tooltips.NetworkLogin: أدخل VirtualDJ.com الدخول. انتقل إلى www.virtualdj.com لإنشاء واحد إذا لم يكن لديها بالفعل.
Tooltips.NetworkPassword: VirtualDJ.com أدخل كلمة المرور. اتركه فارغا وانقر فوق "سجل في" إذا كنت ترغب في التوقف عن اعادة ربط التلقائي.
Tooltips.NetworkConnect: إرسال الدخول وكلمة السر لVirtualDJ.com. يرجى ملاحظة أن تحتاج فقط إلى القيام بذلك مرة واحدة. مرة واحدة متصلة بنجاح ، سوف VirtualDJ معاودة الاتصال تلقائيا في المستقبل.
Tooltips.VideoTVOutput: لكي تتمكن من استخدام انتاج التلفزيون ، ويجب وضع كرت الفيديو الخاص بك في "العرض المزدوج". العرض الثاني ثم ينبغي أن يظهر هنا.
Tooltips.VideoHardware: If something goes wrong with your videocard, try to disable this (but most effects and transitions won't work then)
Tooltips.VideoAutoCross: Let VirtualDJ moves the video crossfader automatically according to your mixing
Tooltips.VideoLinked: Link the video crossfader to the audio crossfader
Tooltips.VideoDecode: Decode the video streams even when the video is hidden (faster transitions, but uses more CPU)
Tooltips.VideoOnLoad: Automatically activate the video window if you load a video file
Tooltips.VideoNoLogo: Remove the VirtualDJ logo from the video output (and get bad karma)
Tooltips.VideoLinkOnDrop: When activated, if you drop a video file on the preview window, its video track will replace the video track of the actual file. If the actual file is audio-only, it will use this video track from now on.
Tooltips.VideoFadeToBlack: Fade the video channel to black when you use the volume sliders
Tooltips.VideoKeepRatioCrop: Keep the videos in 16/9 or 4/3 no matter what the screen resolution is, by cropping the videos on the sides
Tooltips.VideoKeepRatioFull: Keep the videos in 16/9 or 4/3 no matter what the screen resolution is, by adding black bars on the sides
Tooltips.VideoEmptyFx: Use this plugin when the video window is open and there is no video, or the track playing is audio-only
Tooltips.PerfPresets: Select a pre-made set of performance settings. Don't put a higher quality unless you know what you are doing!
Tooltips.PerfLatency: Change the latency used by the soundcard. If you are not using timecodes, we recommend leaving this to auto.
Tooltips.PerfSafeMode: Safe mode lets VirtualDJ pre-compute a few seconds of the song in advance and send it to the soundcard buffer. It will prevent audio glitches if your computer suddenly starts a lengthy kernel operation, like waking up your harddrive. On the other hand, it requires more CPU every times you change the pitch, volume, scratch, or do any action. Don't use safe mode if you use advanced master tempo. (safe mode has no effect on ASIO soundcards)
Tooltips.PerfOverclock: Optimize the internal clock (useful only for old laptops)
Tooltips.PerfBasicInterpolation: Convert from different rates using a basic interpolation algorithm
Tooltips.PerfLowpassFilter: Convert from different rates using filters
Tooltips.PerfOptimQuality: Optimize the scratching algorithm for the best sound quality
Tooltips.PerfOptimLatency: Optimize the scratching algorithm for the best latency
Tooltips.PerfSimpleAlgorithm: Compute the scratch sounds using a simple and fast algorithm
Tooltips.PerfEnhancedAlgorithm: Compute the scratch sounds using an enhanced more realistic algorithm
Tooltips.PerfFilterSize: Defines the complexity of the filters used in the algorithm
Tooltips.PerfFilterSmooth: Uses a smoother algorithm but uses a little more CPU
Tooltips.PerfFastMT: Use the normal Master Tempo algorithm
Tooltips.PerfAdvancedMT: Use an advanced algorithm for Master Tempo. The sound will be better at extreme pitch changes, but this algorithm uses much more CPU
Tooltips.PerfComplexityMT: Defines the complexity of the algorithm for advanced master tempo
Tooltips.PerfSpatializationMT: Defines the complexity of the algorithm for advanced master tempo
Tooltips.TCVinyl: Select what kind of timecode control record you will be using. For best performance, we recommend Serato vinyl or VirtualDJ v5 vinyl.
Tooltips.TCLeftRight: Use this knob if the graphic shows an "egg" instead of a pure circle
Tooltips.TCPhaseAnti: Use this knob if the graphic shows a tilted egg instead of a pure circle
Tooltips.TCGain: Use this knob if the graphic is too small or too big for the window
Tooltips.TCSilence: Use this knob to adjust the gray zone on the graphic, so that it doesn't touch the green circle while in normal operation, but completely covers the green lines when you stop the turntable
Tooltips.TCMode: Select what timecode mode you want to use. In doubt, use "Smart Relative", which is the default and should be used unless you have specific needs
Tooltips.TCDebug: If you have problems getting 100% timecode quality, use these tools to try to adjust your timecode signal
Tooltips.TCInvertStereo: Invert the left and right of the incoming signal (if you inverted the red and white cables from your turntable). use this if your song is playing backward.
Tooltips.TCInvertPhase: Invert the phase of the incoming signal (if your needle has its internal wires inverted). use this if your song is playing backward.
Tooltips.TCRIAA: Apply a software RIAA filter. use this if you are plugging a turntable (with no "line-output" switch) into a regular soundcard that doesn't have a phono pream (no "phono" switch).
Tooltips.TCNoiseFilter: Use this if the graphic is blurry, or if the dots are dispersed instead of forming a continuous circular line
Tooltips.TC45RPM: Use this if your turntable turns at 45RPM instead of 33RPM.
Tooltips.TCNoPitch: If you disable SmartPitch, the pitch slider inside VirtualDJ will not move to reflect the pitch on your turntable, and the BPM of your song will not reflect the pitch change neither.
Tooltips.TCNoClearSound: ClearSound uses a technology that gives a better sound when you don't scratch, at the expense of a very small delay when you scratch
Tooltips.TCNoAntiSkip: AntiSkip uses a technology that will ensure that VirtualDJ will not skip even if your needle skips on your record.
Tooltips.TCPitchSensibility: The Pitch Sensibility is used to adjust how much the pitch slider in VirtualDJ should follow the turntable speed. If set too low, the pitch slider will take some time to adjust. If set too high, the pitch slider will move when you just want to scratch.\n(remember, with the Timecode technology, a software has no clear way to know the difference between a disc turning faster because of the turntable's pitch being moved, or because of the disc being nudged or scratched. both result in the timecode signal coming faster.)
Tooltips.TCLeadTime: Adjusts how much lead time is used on the vinyl before the start of the song. This is used so that VirtualDJ can track timecode movement before the actual start of the song.
Tooltips.TCSaveCapture: Use this button to save a .bmp file of your config. You can then upload this image on www.virtualdj.com forums if you need to ask for help to configure/optimize your timecode signal.

Actions.play_stutter: if paused, start the deck. if playing, restart from last stutter point.
Actions.play_pause: if paused, start the deck. if playing, pause the deck.
Actions.pause_stop: if playing, pause the deck. if stopped, rewind to begining of the song, then cycle through all cue points each time pressed.
Actions.cue_stop: if playing, pause and go to the last cue point. if paused, set the current position as cue point, and preview the cue as long as pressed. you can specify a number ('cue_stop 1', 'cue_stop 57') to work with several cues. number 0 or no number works on the last used cue.
Actions.cue_play: if playing, pause and go to the last cue point. if paused, set the current position as cue point, and preview the cue as long as pressed. if you kept pressed more than 2s (or the time specified), it will continue playing once you release. syntax: 'cue_play 1 1000ms'
Actions.cue: if playing, go to the last cue point and continue playing. if paused, set the current position as cue point, and preview the cue as long as pressed. if in loop, change loop_in to the cue point but keep the loop's length. you can specify a number ('cue 1', 'cue 57') to work with several cues. number 0 or no number works on the last used cue.
Actions.hot_cue: if no cue point is set, set one at the current position. otherwise go to the cue point and start or continue playing. if in loop, set the cue point as new loop_in but keep loop_length. you can specify a number ('hot_cue 1', 'hot_cue 57') to work with several cues. number 0 or no number works on the last used cue.
Actions.cue_select: Select the nth cue point as default cue point for cue, hotcue, etc.. actions
Actions.stop: stop to the last cue point, then on second press to the begining of the song, then cycle through the cue points.
Actions.play_button: depending on the play_mode, act like play_stutter (Numark way) or play_pause (Pioneer way).
Actions.stop_button: depending on the play_mode, act like pause_stop (Numark way) or stop (Pioneer way).
Actions.cue_button: depending on the play_mode, act like cue_stop (Numark way) or cue (Pioneer way).
Actions.crossfader: move the crossfader. crossfader 0% will only let the left deck out, crossfader 100% will only let the right deck out.
Actions.volume: set the volume of the deck.
Actions.pitch: set the pitch of the deck. used with a number, it gives the position on the slider (and therefore account for pitch_range). used with a percent it gives an absolute position. 'pitch 112%' set pitch at +12%, 'pitch 0.25' set pitch at -10% if pitch_range is 20.
Actions.pitch_slider: set the pitch of the deck, to be used by hardware controllers. if the pitch is changed by the software, the hardware slider will be unlinked from the real pitch until it reaches the actual pitch position again.
Actions.pitch_relative: set the pitch of the deck, to be used by hardware controllers if you prefere the change to be relative to the software pitch position
Actions.volume_slider: set the volume of the deck, but can be 'unlinked' from the actual volume if the slider position does not match the software volume position
Actions.volume_relative: set the volume of the deck, relative to the software volume position
Actions.crossfader_slider: move the crossfader, but can be 'unlinked' from the actual crossfader if the slider position does not match the software crossfader position
Actions.crossfader_relative: move the crossfader, relative to the software crossfader position
Actions.gain_slider: change the gain, but can be 'unlinked' from the actual gain if the slider position does not match the software gain position
Actions.gain_relative: change the gain, relative to the software gain position
Actions.jog_wheel: used for a jogwheel without touch sensitivity. 'jog_wheel +1.0' means a full rotation of the wheel.
Actions.scratch_wheel: used for a jogwheel with touch sensitivity. 'scratch_wheel +1.0' means a full rotation of the wheel.
Actions.scratch_wheel_touch: use when the scratch_wheel is touched, to hold the song and start to scratch.
Actions.select: select this deck as 'working deck'. the beat of the working deck will be shown in front in the display, and shortcuts and actions with no specified deck will affect this deck.
Actions.sync: synchronize the song with the other deck.
Actions.sync_nocbg: synchronize the song with the other deck, using local beat information instead of the global beatgrid.
Actions.play_sync: play the song synchronized on the other deck.
Actions.goto: change the position in the song. 'goto +10ms' jumps 10ms forward. 'goto -4' jumps 4 beats backward. 'goto 20%' goes at 20% of the song's length.
Actions.goto_bar: put the song on its nth beat after the downbeat without loosing sync: 'goto_bar 4'
Actions.song_pos: position in the song. (the difference between song_pos and goto is that song_pos can be used as a slider).
Actions.loop: set or remove a loop. 'loop 4', 'loop 0.5' set a loop in beats. 'loop 10ms' set a loop in ms. 'loop 200%' multiply by 2 the size of the loop. 'loop 50%' divides by 2. 'loop' alone set a loop at the actual position with the same beat size as the last set loop.
Actions.loop_in: if not in loop, set the begining of a loop. if in loop, jump back to the begining of the loop.
Actions.loop_out: if not in loop, set the deck in loop, starting from the last set loop_in point or stutter point. if in loop, exit the loop.
Actions.loop_length: change the length of the loop. 'loop_length 15ms' set the length in ms, 'loop_length 0.5' set the length in beats, 'loop_length +100%' set the length in percentage of the actual length.
Actions.loop_move: move the loop without changing its length. 'loop_move +10ms' set the distance in ms, 'loop_move +2' set the distance in beats, 'loop_move +50%' set the distance in percentage of the actual length.
Actions.loop_double: double the size of the loop.
Actions.loop_half: halve the size of the loop.
Actions.loop_select: set the loop size (or default loop size if no loop is active). If no parameter is provided, a popup list of loop values to choose from will be displayed.
Actions.reloop_exit: if in loop, remove the loop. otherwise, reactivate the last used loop.
Actions.set_cue: store the current position in the cue. if one parameter is given, it's the number of the cue to use. if two parameters are given, the second is the position to store, in ms, in beats, or in percentage of the song length.
Actions.delete_cue: delete the cue. a cue number can be specified.
Actions.cue_name: change the name of the cue. if one parameter is given, it's the number of the cue to use. if two parameters are given, the second is the name to give to the cue. If no second parameter is given, a window will popup to ask for the name.
Actions.goto_first_beat: automatically goes to the first beat in the song.
Actions.eq_crossfader_high: crossfade the trebble between both decks.
Actions.eq_crossfader_mid: crossfade the medium between both decks.
Actions.eq_crossfader_low: crossfade the bass between both decks.
Actions.gain: set the gain, up to -30dB in the negative, and up to +7.5dB in the positive.
Actions.power_gain: set the gain, allowing up to +30dB in the positive.
Actions.match_gain: set the gain to match the other deck.
Actions.match_bpm: set the pitch to mathc the BPM of the other deck.
Actions.key: change the key of the song, from -12 (one octave down) to +12 (one octave up), only in multiple of semitones.
Actions.key_smooth: change the key of the song, from -12 (one octave down) to +12 (one octave up), allowing not only multiple of semitones.
Actions.key_move: move the key up or down from the given amount of semitones.
Actions.match_key: change the key of the song to match the given key. you can use standard notation ('set_key "A#m"') or numeric ('set key "03A"'). if no given key, it will use the other deck. the change will be the smallest change to make it compatible with the given key.
Actions.set_key: change the key of the song to match the given key. you can use standard notation ('set_key "A#m"') or numeric ('set key "03A"'). if no given key, it will use the other deck. the change will match the exact key.
Actions.pitch_reset: slowly brings the pitch back to 0%. you can specify the speed in % per second (default 1% per second): 'pitch_reset 5%'
Actions.pitch_range: set the range for the pitch slider. 'pitch 12%' set the range from -12% to +12%. 'pitch +1' scrolls through the defaut pitch ranges. 'pitch "12,16,25" +1' scrolls through the provided list of pitch ranges.
Actions.pitch_bend: slow down or speed up the song: 'pitch_bend +3%'. you can make the bend to increase slowly by specifying a second time parameter: 'pitch_bend +1% 500ms' will start at +1% and will double every 500ms.
Actions.master_tempo: activate/deactivate the master tempo (to make the pitch slider change the speed of the song, but keep the original key of the song).
Actions.key_lock: activate/deactivate the key lock (to make the pitch slider change the speed of the song, but keep the key of the song like it is now).
Actions.seek: move into the song while the button is pressed. 'seek +2' moves beat by beat, skipping 2 beats every 10ms. 'seek +420ms' moves from 420ms every 10ms. using skip with a beat number keep the song playing correctly while moving inside.
Actions.dump: reverse the playback direction while dump is active, then when deactivated, start again forward from where the song should have been if it had been playing forward during the dump.
Actions.minimize: minimize the application in the taskbar.
Actions.maximize: maximize the application full screen, or back to normal.
Actions.page: change the page displayed in the browser window. 'page "browser"', 'page "sampler"', 'page "effects"', 'page "record"' set a specific page. 'page +1', 'page -1' scroll through the pages.
Actions.master_balance: change the left/right balance on the master output.
Actions.master_volume: change the volume of the master output.
Actions.headphone_volume: change the volume of the PFL output.
Actions.headphone_gain: change the gain of the PFL output (from -30dB to +30dB)
Actions.headphone_mix: change the mix of the PFL (0% is only the cued deck, 100% is the master output).
Actions.headphone_crossfader: change the PFL fader (0% is only the left deck, 100% is only the right deck).
Actions.mic_volume: change the volume of the microphone.
Actions.zoom: set the zoom level on the rhythm display. use 'zoom "near"', 'zoom "default"', 'zoom "far"' for the pre-set zoom levels, or use 'zoom 42%' to get to a precise zoom level.
Actions.smart_loop: when smart_loop is activated, loop are automagically adjusted to sound perfect.
Actions.smart_play: when smart_play is activated, songs are automagically synchronized when played.
Actions.smart_cue: when smart_cue is activated, songs are automatigically re-synchronized when jumped to a new position or cue.
Actions.smart_scratch: when smart_scratch is activated, backward scratching is automatically muted, only forward scratching will be heard.
Actions.vinyl_mode: set the jogwheel in vinyl mode (with scratch), or in cd mode (with pitchbend). 1 is vinyl mode (default), 0 is cd mode.
Actions.wheel_mode: change the mode of the jogwheel between: "jog", "search", "loop_move", "loop_out", "loop_in", "browser", or use +1 and -1 to cycle through all modes. You can select from a subset using a syntax like 'wheel_mode "loop_move,loop_in,loop_out" +1'.
Actions.play_mode: set the mode for play/stop/cue buttons: 'play_mode "numark"', or 'play_mode "pioneer"'.
Actions.display_time: set the mode to display time: "total", "remain", "elapsed", +1 or -1.
Actions.beatlock: activate/deactivate the beatlock (to keep the songs always in sync, even while moving the pitch).
Actions.pitchlock: lock the pitch sliders on both decks so both will move together.
Actions.auto_crossfade: automatically crossfade to the other deck. You can specify the duration of the crossfade in ms: 'auto_crossfade 2000ms'
Actions.scratch_hold: 'scratch_hold on' or 'scratch_hold off' (or 'scratch_hold toggle') to stop the disc for scratching, or release it.
Actions.nudge: 'nudge +120ms' to nudge the song 120ms forward (using mastertempo if it's activated).
Actions.timecode_active: active or unactive the action of the timecoded vinyl.
Actions.timecode_bypass: bypass the timecoded input and play the vinyl directly through the soundoutput. all gain, RIAA and stereo correction are still applied. this mode works only if both the input and the output are on the same ASIO soundcard.
Actions.blink: turn on and off the LED, once per second. You can specify the speed: 'blink 1000ms'
Actions.var: syntax: 'var "my_var" ? my_action1 : my_action2'. execute my_action1 if my_var is true (non zero), execute my_action2 otherwise.
Actions.var_equal: syntax: 'var_equal "my_var" 42 ? my_action1 : my_action2'. execute my_action1 if my_var equals 42, execute my_action2 otherwise.
Actions.var_not_equal: syntax: 'var_not_equal "my_var" 42 ? my_action1 : my_action2'. execute my_action1 if my_var doesn't equal 42, execute my_action2 otherwise.
Actions.var_smaller: syntax: 'var_smaller "my_var" 42 ? my_action1 : my_action2'. execute my_action1 if my_var is smaller than 42, execute my_action2 otherwise.
Actions.var_greater: syntax: 'var_greater "my_var" 42 ? my_action1 : my_action2'. execute my_action1 if my_var is greater than 42, execute my_action2 otherwise.
Actions.set: syntax: 'set "my_var" 42'. set my_var to 42. if the variable name starts with '$', the variable is global (ie the same for all decks): 'set "$myglobalvar"'.
Actions.toggle: syntax: 'toggle "my_var"'. toggle my_var between true and false.
Actions.cycle: syntax: 'cycle "my_var" 42'. increment my_var, and goes back to 0 when it reaches 42. 'cycle "my_var" -42' decrements my_var, and goes to 41 after it reached 0.
Actions.param_equal: check if the value of the calling slider/encoder/button is equal to something.
Actions.param_greater: check if the value of the calling slider/encoder/button is greater than something: 'param_greater 0 ? sampler loop 200% : sampler loop 50%'
Actions.param_smaller: check if the value of the calling slider/encoder/button is smaller than something: 'param_smaller 0 ? sampler loop 200% : sampler loop 50%'
Actions.param_multiply: multiply the value of the calling slider/encoder/button by the given value: 'param_multiply 300% & effect slider'
Actions.param_add: add the given value to the value of the calling slider/encoder/button
Actions.param_invert: invert the value of the calling slider/encoder/button: 'param_invert & pitch_slider'
Actions.param_mod: wrap the value of the calling slider/encoder if more than the given value
Actions.param_pingpong: transform the value of the calling slider/encoder from a linear scale to a forth-and-back scale
Actions.action_deck: return true if the button calling this action is on the specified deck: 'action_deck 1 ? actionA : actionB'
Actions.loaded: return true if a song is loaded on the deck
Actions.holding: execute different actions depending if the key is pressed for a long time or not: 'holding ? automix : mix_now'. you can specify the time ('holding 1000ms'), by default it's 500ms.
Actions.up: execute different actions depending if the key if pressed or released: 'up ? action1 : action2'
Actions.down: execute different actions depending if the key if pressed or released: 'down ? action1 : action2'
Actions.isrepeat: execute different actiosn depending if the key is being repeated or if it's the first message (only keyboard shortcuts are repeated while held down): 'isrepeat ? nothing : goto_cue')
Actions.video: open or close the video window
Actions.video_crossfader: set the position of the video crossfader
Actions.video_crossfader_link: link or unlink the video crossfader to the audio crossfader
Actions.video_crossfader_auto: move the video crossfader automatically according to which side is playing, cueing, scratching, etc...
Actions.video_transition: launch a transition from one video deck to the other. you can specify the duration of the transition: 'video_transition 1000ms'
Actions.video_transition_select: select the plugin used for video transitions. you can specify by name ('video_transition_select "my_plugin"'), relative ('video_transition_select +1') or without parameters to open a popup window listing the available plugins
Actions.video_transition_slider: move the n-th slider of the video transition plugin
Actions.video_transition_button: push the n-th button of the video transition plugin
Actions.video_fx_select: select a video effect plugin. you can specify by name ('video_fx_select "my_plugin"'), relative ('video_fx_select +1') or without parameters to open a popup window listing the available plugins
Actions.video_fx_slider: move the n-th slider of the video effect plugin
Actions.video_fx_button: push the n-th button of the video effect plugin
Actions.video_fx_clear: deactivate all the active video effects
Actions.videofile_link: link a new video to be used as image for the audio song currently on the specified deck. you can specify a filename ('videofile_link "my_video"'). if you don't give a parameter, the file currently selected in the browser is used. use 'videofile_link off' to remove the link.
Actions.add_favoritefolder: make the selected folder a favorite folder (monitored folders).
Actions.add_virtualfolder: create a new virtual folder (unmonitored folder).
Actions.goto_last_folder: go back to the last browsed folder.
Actions.browser_scroll: scroll through the songs or folders.
Actions.browser_enter: if focus is on songs, load the selected song. if focus is on folders, change focus to songs.
Actions.browser_folder: if focus is on songs, change focus to folders. if focus is on folders, open or close the subfolders of the selected folder.
Actions.browser_window: change the active browser zone. 'browser_window "folders"', 'browser_window "songs"', 'browser_window "playlist"', 'browser_window "sidelist"', or 'browser_window +1'.
Actions.search: put the keyboard focus in the search zone, or, if a text parameter is specified, search for this text (an empty text will empty the search box).
Actions.log_search: log the current search in the SearchLog.txt file, so you can easily search for your failed requests once the gig is over.
Actions.automix: start or stop the automatic playlist mixing.
Actions.automix_skip: if automix is active, skip the actual song and mix to the next one in the playlist.
Actions.playlist_options: display a drop-down with the list of options for the playlist.
Actions.playlist_randomize: shuffle the order of the songs in the playlist.
Actions.playlist_remove_played: remove from the playlist all the songs that have already been played since the software was launched.
Actions.playlist_repeat: repeat (or stop to repeat) the playlist while automixing.
Actions.playlist_save: save the playlist in a file.
Actions.playlist_remove_duplicates: remove duplicate songs from the playlist.
Actions.create_virtualfolder_from_playlist: save the playlist in a virtual folder.
Actions.playlist_add: add to the playlist the songs selected in the browser.
Actions.playlist_load_and_keep: load the first song in the playlist on the deck, but keep it in the playlist.
Actions.playlist_load_and_remove: load the first song in the playlist on the deck, and remove it from the playlist.
Actions.switch_sidelist_playlist: exchange the content of the playlist and the sidelist.
Actions.sidelist_add: add to the sidelist the songs selected in the browser.
Actions.sidelist_load_and_keep: load the first song from the sidelist.
Actions.sidelist_load_and_remove: load the first song from the sidelist, and remove it from the sidelist.
Actions.virtualfolder_add: add to the specified virtualfolder the songs selected in the browser. 'virtualfolder_add "my_vfolder"'. if no folder name is given, add to the last one.
Actions.load: load the selected song on the deck. you can also specify a fullpath to load 'load "path_to_my_song"'.
Actions.file_info: open a window to edit many informations about the selected track.
Actions.edit_comment: open a window to edit the comment on the selected track.
Actions.browser_sort: sort the browser files on the specified columne: 'browser_sort "smart"', 'browser_sort "author"', 'browser_sort "lastplay"', etc...
Actions.browser_gotofolder: 'browser_gotofolder' goes to the folder containing the current file. 'browser_gotofolder "/my_path/my_folder"' goes to the specified folder. 'browser_gotofolder 4' goes to the fourth virtual/favorite folder.
Actions.recurse_folder: display the content of both the selected folder and all its subfolders in the browser list.
Actions.search_options: popup the list of search options. to set one directly, you can use 'search_options "composer" toggle' etc...
Actions.view_options: popup the list of view options. to set one directly, you can use 'view_options "showkaraoke" on' etc...
Actions.beat_tap: tap on a few beats to set a new bpm for the song if the application didn't got it right on the first time.
Actions.set_bpm: set the bpm of the song to the set value: 'set_bpm 129.3', or relative to the actual value: 'set_bpm 50%'.
Actions.edit_bpm: open a window with tools to fine-tune the bpm of the song.
Actions.adjust_cbg: adjust the beat grid. 'adjust_cbg +2' moves the start bar from 4:4. 'adjust_cbg +10%' moves the actual bars.
Actions.goto_mixpoint: go to the specified mix point, from "StartTempo", "EndTempo", "StartCut", "EndCut", "StartFade", "EndFade".
Actions.set_mixpoint: set the specified mix point to the actual pos, or to the specified pos.
Actions.record_cut: cut the current recording to a new file (or new track if recording to CD)
Actions.crossfader_curve: select the curve of the crossfader. enter a value to adjust the slope from a X curve (0%) to a inverted-U curve (100%). you can also specify common curves by name ("smooth", "full", "scratch", "cut", "disabled"). or you can draw your own curve, using a syntax like 'crossfader_curve "0=[1,0]/0.5=[1,1]/1=[0,1]"'.
Actions.show_pluginpage: show the specified plugin page: "Sound Effects", "Video Effects", "Video Transitions", "Others".
Actions.unload: unload the song from the deck.
Actions.clone_deck: clone the deck (load the same song on the other deck, and play it from the same position, ready for beat-juggling).
Actions.clone_deck_nopitch: clone the deck (load the same song on the other deck, and play it from the same position, ready for beat-juggling), but do not match the pitch (for timecode turntable pitching).
Actions.skin_pannel: show or hide the nammed pannel from the skin: 'skin_pannel "my_pannel" on'.
Actions.multibutton_select: open the selection menu for the named multibutton. if a second text parameter is provided after the name, use it as the new action to load in the multibutton: 'multibutton_select "my_button" "goto_cue 2 & play"'.
Actions.mix_now: Smoothly crossfade from one side to the other, using beatsync if both songs have enough beat.
Actions.mix_now_nosync: Smoothly crossfade from one side to the other.
Actions.mix_next: if the non-playing deck has a song loaded that's already been played, load a new one from the playlist. then, smoothly crossfade from the playing deck to the other, using beatsync if both songs have enough beat.
Actions.mix_next_sidelist: if the non-playing deck has a song loaded that's already been played, load a new one from the sidelist. then, smoothly crossfade from the playing deck to the other, using beatsync if both songs have enough beat.
Actions.automix_dualdeck: enable or disable automix using both decks (deprecated).
Actions.relay_play: enable or disable the decks to automatically start playing when the opposite deck reached its end
Actions.beat_juggle: alternatively jumps one beat forward and backward
Actions.invert_controllers: invert the deck of the controllers.
Actions.refresh_controller: refresh the display of the specified controller (or all if none specified).
Actions.reinit_controller: reinit the specified controller (or all if none specified), going through the exit and init sequences (you can specify a delay between exit and init: 'reinit_controllers "mycontroller" 200ms'.
Actions.menu: display a menu on the controller's screen, that allows to change the behaviour of the menu_buttons. you can navigate through the menu using the browser_scroll action'.
Actions.menu_button: defines a button whose behaviour can be changed by a menu. Syntax: 'menu_button 1 "hotcue,sampler,effect,loop"'.
Actions.show_text: display the text provided for a limited time (default 3 seconds). '$myvar$' in the text are replaced by the value of myvar. '$?myvar$' are replaced by 'on' or 'off'. '|' goes to new line. syntax: 'show_text "Shift:|Value=$?shift$" 5000ms'
Actions.songpos_remain: get the remaining time in %. if used with a parameter (in % or ms), returns true if the time left is less or equal than the value: 'songpos_remain 500ms blink'.
Actions.getfood: because no DJ should work on an empty stomach
Actions.dmx_setvalue: Set an individual dmx value. first parameter is channel, second is value
Actions.sampler_play: play the selected sample. syntax 'sampler play' plays the default sample. 'sampler 4 play' plays the fourth sampler slot.
Actions.sampler_play_stutter: play the selected sample. if already playing, restart from begining.
Actions.sampler_play_stop: play the selected sample if it's not already playing, or stop it if it's already playing.
Actions.sampler_stop: stop the selected sample. syntax 'sampler stop' stops the default sample. 'sampler 4 stop' stops the fourth sampler slot. 'sampler all stop' stops all samples.
Actions.sampler_volume: change the volume of the selected sample.
Actions.sampler_rec: on first press, start to record a new sample in the selected slot. on second press, stop to record.
Actions.sampler_start_rec: start to record a new sample in the selected slot.
Actions.sampler_stop_rec: stop to record the new sample.
Actions.sampler_abort_rec: abort the recording of the sample.
Actions.sampler_loop: put the sample in loop, or change the size of the loop: 'sampler default loop on' or 'sampler default loop 50%'.
Actions.sampler_pitched: lock or unlock the pitch of the sample on the current song.
Actions.sampler_beatlock: lock or unlock the phase of the sample on the current song.
Actions.sampler_select: select which sample is the default sampler slot for that deck. syntax 'sampler select 5' selects the fifth sampler slot. 'sampler select +1' scrolls through the sampler slots. 'sampler select' open a popup menu to select the new default sampler slot.
Actions.sampler_load: load a new sample in the selected slot. 'sampler load "my_sample.vds"' loads a specified file. 'sampler load' open a selection window.
Actions.sampler_save: save the current sample in a file. 'sampler save "my_sample.vds"' saves in a specified file. 'sampler_save' open a selection window.
Actions.sampler_position: get the current position of the sample
Actions.effect_active: start or stop the effect. you can also specify an effect by name ('effect "my_effect" active on'), or use a different effect slot ('effect 3 active').
Actions.effect_select: select a new effect. you can specify the effect by name ('effect select "my_effect"'), or relative to the current effect ('effect select +1'). with no parameters ('effect select'), it will open a popup under the mouse with the list of available effects. you can also specify a different effect slot ('effect 4 select "my_effect"').
Actions.effect_slider: move the n-th slider on the given effect
Actions.effect_button: push the n-th button on the given effect
Actions.get_time_min: get the minutes of the elapsed time (or remaining or total, depending on "display_time"). use 'get time_min "absolute"' if you don't want to take the pitch variations in account.
Actions.get_time_sec: get the seconds of the elapsed time (or remaining or total, depending on "display_time").
Actions.get_time_ms: get the miliseconds of the elapsed time (or remaining or total, depending on "display_time").
Actions.get_totaltime_min: get the minutes of the length of the song.
Actions.get_totaltime_sec: get the seconds of the length of the song.
Actions.get_totaltime_ms: get the miliseconds of the length of the song.
Actions.get_pitch: get the pitch from -100% to +100%, centered on 0%
Actions.get_pitch_value: get the pitch from 0% to 200%, centered on 100%
Actions.get_bpm: get the bpm of the song.
Actions.get_beat: get the intensity of the beat at the current position (0% to 100%).
Actions.get_beat2: get the intensity of the beats from both decks at the same time.
Actions.get_text: get some text to display. depending on the latest action, it can be the name of an effect, the folder being browsed, the title of the current song, etc... for multiline text, you can add the line number: "get text 1", "get text 2".
Actions.get_level: get the value of the incoming vu-meter. don't specify a deck if you want the master mix vu-meter.
Actions.get_level_left: get the value of the incoming vu-meter for the left balance.
Actions.get_level_right: get the value of the incoming vu-meter for the right balance.
Actions.get_vu_meter: get the value of the outgoing vu-meter. don't specify a deck if you want the master output vu-meter.
Actions.get_vu_meter_left: get the value of the outgoing vu-meter for the left balance.
Actions.get_vu_meter_right: get the value of the outgoing vu-meter for the right balance.
Actions.get_rotation: get the angle of the disc
Actions.get_arm: get the position of the turntable arm
Actions.get_position: get the position in the song
Actions.get_automix: get the position of the automix crossfader
Actions.get_volume: get the volume applied by both the volume sliders and the crossfader
Actions.get_deck: get the number of the deck.
Actions.get_var: get the numeric value of the specified variable
Actions.get_active_loop: get the number of beats in the current loop
Actions.get_loop: get the number of beats in the current loop or the default loop size if no loop is active
Actions.get_cue: get the number of the last used cue
Actions.get_key_modifier: get the number of semitone up or down currently applied to the song
Actions.get_beat_num: get the number of the current beat in the 4:4 bar. 'get beat_num' returns the beat number from 1 to 4. 'get beat_num 2' return true if the song is on a second beat. 'get beat_num 2 16' returns true if the song is on the second beat of a 4:16 bar.
Actions.get_beat_bar: get the position in % in the 4:4 bar (or in 4:16 if called with 'get beat_bar 16')
Actions.get_filepath: get the filepath of the song on the deck
Actions.get_filename: get the filename of the song on the deck
Actions.get_filesize: get the filesize of the song on the deck
Actions.get_artist: get the artist of the song on the deck
Actions.get_title: get the title of the song on the deck
Actions.get_artist-title: get the artist and title of the song on the deck, separated by a '-'
Actions.get_title-artist: get the title and artist of the song on the deck, separated by a '-'
Actions.get_album: get the album of the song on the deck
Actions.get_genre: get the genre of the song on the deck
Actions.get_composer: get the composer of the song on the deck
Actions.get_songlength: get the length in seconds of the song on the deck
Actions.get_comment: get the comment of the song on the deck
Actions.get_version: get the version of VirtualDJ (in text)
Actions.get_build: get the version of VirtualDJ (in numeric)
Actions.get_hwnd: return the Windows handle to VirtualDJ's window
Actions.get_vdj_folder: return the home folder of VirtualDJ.
Actions.get_browsed_artist: get the artist of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_browsed_title: get the title of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_browsed_artist-title: get the artist and title of the selected song in the browser, separated by a '-'
Actions.get_browsed_title-artist: get the title and artist of the selected song in the browser, separated by a '-'
Actions.get_browsed_album: get the album of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_browsed_composer: get the composer of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_browsed_genre: get the genre of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_browsed_comment: get the comment of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_browsed_filepath: get the filepath of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_browsed_bpm: get the bpm of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_browsed_key: get the key of the selected song in the browser
Actions.get_sampler_slot: get the number of the sampler slot selected on this deck
Actions.get_constant: return the given constant: 'get constant 75%' always returns 75%
Actions.get_sampler_used: get the number of active sampler slots
Actions.get_effects_used: get the number of active effect plugins
Actions.get_effect_name: get the name of the currently selected effect
Actions.get_sample_name: get the name of the currently selected sample
Actions.get_videofx_name: get the name of the currently selected video effect
Actions.get_videotrans_name: get the name of the currently selected video transition

ToolTips.tooltip: Log this search in the SearchLog.txt file
Tap to modify the BPM (right-click for advanced edit
